main module

Main module for controlling TV and other functions.

This module contains functions for controlling TV commands such as power on/off, mute/unmute, volume up/down, and channel up/down. It also provides functions for managing configuration, resetting mouse position, speaking text, and cleaning up resources.

main.channelDown()[source]

Send channel down command.

main.channelUp()[source]

Send channel up command.

main.cleanup()[source]

Cleanup resources.

main.loadConfig()[source]

Load configuration.

Send mute command.

main.powerOnOff()[source]

Send power on command.

Reset mouse position.

Speak from text.

Speak text.

Toggle plug.

Send volume up command.
